title: Jerusalem artichoke soup with crispy chorizo
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '60ml white wine', '200ml chicken stock', '800g Jerusalem artichokes, peeled and chopped', '1 medium potato, peeled and chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '8 slices chorizo, cut into 1cm squares', '2 tablespoons Greek yoghurt', '100ml milk, or as needed', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
